prompts:
Review docs/ZAI-INTEGRATION-PLAN.md and create a detailed execution plan for implementing Z.ai integration into MAO. Then create specialized agents to execute each phase:

1. Create a meta-agent to analyze the plan and break it into discrete tasks
2. Create a research agent to verify Z.ai SDK compatibility and test basic connectivity  
3. Create a development agent to implement the ZaiAgentClient wrapper
4. Create a testing agent to validate the implementation
5. Create a documentation agent to update all relevant docs

After creating the agents, coordinate them to execute Phase 2 (Install & Test Z.ai SDK) from the integration plan. The goal is to:
- Install zai-sdk package
- Test basic connection with ZAI_API_KEY (Active key is in the .env file)
- Verify API compatibility
- Document any issues or blockers
- Report findings


Use the working directory: /Users/sem/mao-z

Start by reading the integration plan, then create your execution strategy and agents.
interrupt stop we have a cli issue
I had to stop you because there was a CLI issue. Can you go ahead and make sure that you're creating the agents start from that step again
agent name=zai-developer command="Continue with the Z.ai integration task you were working on"
